intro: Psychotria bangueyensis, commonly known as the Bangueyensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Ecuador and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, berry-like fruits that are typically green when immature and turn red when mature. Psychotria bangueyensis is often found in humid, shaded environments such as cloud forests.
